## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G17590](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G17590)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>BSH, CHE1</u>
- **Gene Name:** BUSHY GROWTH
- **Description:**   transcription regulatory protein SNF5, putative (BSH);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2090512
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
